ACI is committed to seeking out and leveraging differences and unique 
perspectives to drive continued business success. Our diversity, equity 
and inclusion (DEI) strategy is focused on connecting DEI to individual and 
business success, ensuring equal opportunities and developing diverse 
leaders to foster an inclusive work environment.
 
We are dedicated to empowering and promoting diverse leaders within 
the organization. Women and members of underrepresented groups are 
members of our board and Executive Leadership Team and hold important 
roles across the organization, including in our software engineering, product 
management, sales and corporate functions. We actively promote dialogues 
regarding ethnic and gender diversity and inclusion, and we encourage and 
provide mentorship to support all employees in their career progression. In 
our 2021 Employee Experience survey, 86% of our employees agreed our 
company is committed to DEI in the workplace.

ACI recognizes the gender pay gap in the 
technology industry, and we are committed 
to changing it. We monitor the average 
pay for everyone within the organization, 
which includes examining any pay differences 
between men and women. To increase women 
representation in the payments industry, we actively 
participate in industry partnerships and provide 
education resources.  
 
For more details about our initiatives, please visit the 
Making a Difference in Our Communities section of
